import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from '../_services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit{ model:any={}; loggedIn=false; constructor(private _accountSer:AccountService) {} ngOnInit(): void { } login(){ console.log(this.model) return this._accountSer.login(this.model).subscribe({ next:response=>{ console.log(response); this.loggedIn=true; }, error:error=>console.log(error.error) }); } logout(){ this.loggedIn=false; } }
